My gut is speaking to me in its floral way and it's telling me it's no coincidence that Carter drops off the Tangle during the 23 minutes in which Margot was killed.
Sa femme fait l'amour dans les trous et les coins derrière son dos sur le Tangle, tu vois, parce qu'elle ne pouvait pas le faire ailleurs.
His wife is diddling in holes and corners behind his back on the Tangle, you know, because she couldn't do it anywhere else.
Elle est la seule qui peut faire danser le Tangle, elle est la seule qui pouvait faire en sorte que quelqu'un entre et sorte de cette pièce sans que personne ne s'en aperçoive.
She's the only one that can make the Tangle dance, she's the only one that could get someone in and out of that room without anyone noticing.
